channel.title: I gots a scar question
channel.description: i trying to make a auto talker....and how do i make it hit enter...i can get it to type it..but dunno the command for it hitting enter

item.title: I gots a scar question
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

The WriteLn procedure writes stuff to the debug box in scar. To make it type in Runescape, you need to make all the WriteLn procedures SendKeys. And make sure you drag the crosshair onto the runescape client, and put this at the beginning of your main loob.

ActivateClient;

Put that in the next line after your last ‘begin’.

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: I gots a scar question
item.dc:creator: @killer_kure killer kure
item.description:
@killer_kure wrote:

program hello;

const
Message1=‘hello world!’; {type in msg u want here}
Message2=‘i am a G fool’; {type the 2nd msg you want here}
procedure hello;
begin
wait(1000)
Writeln(Message1)
wait (1000)
SendKeys(Chr(13));
wait (300)
writeln(Message2)
wait(1000)
SendKeys(Chr(13));
wait (300)
end;

begin
repeat
hello;
until(false)
end.

that is script so far…how do i make it type the msg in runescape??

Read full topic

item.title: I gots a scar question
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Say your using the SendKeys command, you would use “SendKeys(‘stuffhereplz’ + chr(13));” or “SendKeys(Chr(13));”.

Read full topic
